Reviews.Title: Nice specs but QC issues
Reviews.Author: Mike Hall
Reviews.Content: For a low price, this camera has good resolution and would be satisfactory night situations that don't require a large amount of IR illumination.  But is pretty basic, with only 12 inch cabling, sparse documentation. I purchased one and it worked for a few minutes and then quit.  Fortunately, within the 30 day return window at Amazon so back it went.

ProductInfo.Features:
1/3" Color CMOS Sensor, 700 TV-Line / 728 x 488
Lens 3.6mm / F2.0, 12 IR LED units up to 30 ft.
Auto / Back Light Compensation / White Balance / Shutter / Gain Control
12V at 250mA max
Aposonic A-XPWAD 500mA Power Adapter is sold separately
ProductInfo.Name: Aposonic A-CM700F CCTV Surveillance Security IR Camera (Silver)
